content: {恢复相机}{转向玩家}{转向莎莎}Here, take this <style=Highlight>Radiant Moon Chair Inspo Card</style>. We need more fun furniture like this!
info: 月亮椅拍照-莎莎-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {看向莎莎}Oh, what's this?{短暂停} Lemme try it out! You setting up a garden out here, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>?
info: 月亮椅拍照-莎莎-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A想象中}If we had a little garden on our planet, where everyone could sit together, sip tea, and watch the clouds turn orange... And then a tornado rolls in! Swoosh~!

content: Can't wait to see you spice things up around here! Once it's all set, we're all coming over to have some fun, swoosh~!
info: 月亮椅拍照-莎莎-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Why are you just standing there? How about... you sit on that moon over there, and let's snap a pic together?

content: Just imagining that cozy and wild vibe... makes my ears get all twisted up from the excitement!
